purpose: The code appears to be collecting system information and sending it to external domains for tracking purposes.
flows: ip address from ip-api.com -> trackingData -> http.request
anomalies: Use of hardcoded external domains for data exfiltration
Sending system information to third-party tracking servers
Use of http.request with rejectUnauthorized set to false
No validation or sanitization of collected data
analysis: The code collects sensitive system information including IP address, hostname, username, and directory paths. This data is then sent to three external domains via HTTP requests. The use of rejectUnauthorized: false suggests potential security issues with certificate validation. This behavior is characteristic of malicious software or tracking scripts.
